title.en: Dorei Shounin shika Sentakushi ga Nai desu yo? Harem? Nani Sore Oishii no?

altTitles.ja: Dorei Shounin Shika Sentakushi Ga Nai desu Yo? ~Harem? Nani sore oishii no?~

altTitles.en: Is The Only Option a Slave Merchant? ~ Harem? What is that, Is it tasty? ~

altTitles.ja: 奴隷商人しか選択肢がないですよ?～ハーレム?なにそれおいしいの?～

description.en:
Zeolith wanted a chill life, but when he turned 15 his villages rule was that they had to go to the vocational school "Velciel" where each student will choose their profession. Zeolith wanted an easy job where he could laze around all day, but the only options he got were : "The Highest Peak of the Human Race【Hero】", "The Strongest Ruler 【Demon Emperor】", "The Title of the Strongest Magician 【Great Sage】", "And the last one "The Lowest Title, a Job For Scum【Slave Merchant】". 

None of the titles were a good option. He picked the lowest title 【Slave Merchant】, which is inconspicuous among them and seems to be easy to live. But, He doesn't know it yet. 

It's the lowest occupation but it is the strongest for him and the most annoying-tiring ones. A harem struggle to be swayed by a variety of women, slutty alluring girls from elderly to younger ones who are his childhood friend's, the poisonous plantgirl, elves, cat ears adventurer, Loli Demon Lord, et cetera.  
  
This is Tale of The strongest【Slave Merchant】unwillingly makes a big success!
description.id:
Zeoris menginginkan kehidupan yang santai, tetapi ketika dia berusia 15 tahun, aturan desanya adalah bahwa mereka harus pergi ke sekolah keahlian “Velciel” di mana setiap siswa akan memilih profesi mereka. Zeoris menginginkan pekerjaan yang mudah di mana dia bisa bermalas-malasan sepanjang hari, tetapi satu-satunya pilihan yang dia dapatkan adalah: “Puncak Tertinggi dari Ras Manusia 【HERO】”, “Penguasa Terkuat 【Demon Emperor】”, “Gelar yang Terkuat Penyihir 【Great Sage】 “,” Dan yang terakhir “Tittle Terendah, Pekerjaan Untuk Sampah 【Slave Merchant】”. Tidak ada gelar yang merupakan pilihan bagus. Dia memilih gelar terendah 【Slave Merchant】, yang tidak mencolok di antara mereka dan tampaknya mudah untuk hidup.  
  
Tapi, dia belum mengetahuinya. Itu adalah pekerjaan paling rendah tetapi itu yang terkuat baginya dan yang paling melelahkan. Perjuangan harem untuk diombang-ambingkan oleh berbagai wanita, gadis cantik yang memikat dari tua hingga yang lebih muda yang merupakan teman masa kecilnya, gadis tumbuhan beracun, elf, petualang telinga kucing, Loli Demon Lord, dan lain-lain.  
  
Ini adalah Dongeng Terkuat 【Slave Merchant】 yang enggan membuat sukses besar!

altTitles.es-la: El Sirviente de la Joven Dama

description.en: The story centers around a main character who was raised as a butler from his family's trade, and who one day meets a rich young lady who cannot even change her own clothes, let alone know what to do in the outside world.
description.ja: 父は執事、母はメイドという両親の元で生まれ育ち、世話焼き属性が染みついた主人公の前に現れたのは、身の回りのことが何も出来ないお嬢様。
description.pt: A história se concentra em um personagem principal que foi criado como mordomo do comércio de sua família e que, um dia, conhece um jovem rica que nem sequer consegue trocar sua própria roupa e, muito menos, saber o que fazer no mundo exterior.
description.es-la: La historia se centra en un personaje principal que fue criado como un mayordomo por la ocupación de su familia, y que un día conoce a una joven rica que no puede siquiera cambiarse la ropa por su propia cuenta, y mucho menos, saber qué hacer en el mundo exterior.
description.pt-br: A história se concentra em um personagem principal que tem uma personalidade intrometida cujo pai é um mordomo e cuja mãe é uma criada e que, um dia, conhece uma jovem rica que nem sequer consegue trocar sua própria roupa e, muito menos, saber o que fazer no mundo exterior

description.en: This tongue-in-cheek semi-autobiography follows the absurdly gruesome adventures of a lonely boy and his singularly crazed family. His escape from the madness that surrounds him is his collection of pickled animal and human body parts, to which he adds as one family member after another meet with a grotesque and sometimes terrifyingly funny death... (Source: AniList)

Tludia was on her way to become a Knight within the Order when she was unexpectedly kicked out for breaking too many weapons and – wait for it – eating too much. But that doesn’t mean she should stand idly by when she witnesses an old man about to be attacked by a band of robbers. Luckily for her – because she was a second too late – the old man did not need saving. It’s Tludia that needs saving. Much older than his appearance suggests, Tludia rekindles a long lost memory in him, and he decides to repay her for her efforts by finding a cure for her disease (with promises of food, of course). Thus begins their journey to bring life to one, and long-awaited peace to the other.

Haruka Sakura wants nothing to do with weaklings—he's only interested in the strongest of the strong. He's just started at Furin High School, a school of degenerates known only for their brawling strength—strength they use to protect their town from anyone who wishes it ill. But Haruka's not interested in being a hero or being part of any sort of team—he just wants to fight his way to the top!
description.fr:
Haruka Sakura est le genre de lycéen qui fait passer la baston avant les révisions. Fraîchement débarqué en ville, c'est donc le sourire aux lèvres qu'il compte pousser les portes du lycée Fûrin, l'établissement scolaire au pire taux de délinquance du pays... Les intentions de Haruka sont claires : se mesurer aux meilleurs bagarreurs de ce bahut et devenir le meilleur de tous ! Mais entre-temps, il se retrouve mêlé à une altercation avec une bande de brutes dans un des quartiers de la ville, avant d'être sauvé in extremis par des élèves de son lycée. Haruka réalise alors à quel genre de phénomènes il risque d'avoir affaire...

Maison d'édition FR : Pika
description.ja: 彼らは、最強の不良軍団。そして、街の英雄───。偏差値は最底辺、喧嘩は最強。超不良校として名高い学校・風鈴（ふうりん）高校。この春、そんな風鈴のトップを目指して街にやってきた風鈴高校１年生・桜遥（さくらはるか）は、風鈴高校が“防風鈴（ボウフウリン）”と名付けられた街を守る集団となっていたことを知る。そして桜は、風鈴の一員として街を守るため戦い始めることに──！　不良高校生・桜の喧嘩英雄伝説、開幕!!
description.pt-br: A Fûrin High School ganhou a pior reputação entre as escolas da região por ter a média mais baixa e os alunos mais rebeldes. E nela ingressa Haruka Sakura, um jovem que acaba de chegar na cidade, que busca ser o mais forte para poder proteger todos com quem se importa. Para atingir seu objetivo, porém, a primeira coisa que ele deve fazer é se juntar a uma gangue chamada Wind Breaker, que representa seu instituto e cujo objetivo é defender a cidade de outras gangues e bandidos. No entanto, para que eles o aceitem, ele terá que ganhar o respeito deles com os punhos!

altTitles.ja: マネーアイドルエクスチェンジャー
爆転シュート ベイブレード
爆転シュートベイブレード

description.en:
Tyson's on a mission to be the best Beyblader ever! But his enemies, the Blade Sharks, are super tough and they'll do anything to win! Tyson just ight have what it takes to win when he busts out with a new Beyblade given to him by a mysterious stranger. Now the Blade Sharks want his new Beyblade and they're prepared to use any dirty trick to get it! 


---
Official Release:
- Indonesian release by Elex Media 
  
The following link is to AnimeNewsNetwork for all of the various manga, anime adaptions, sequels, and spinoffs:  
[Beyblade](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/manga.php?id=4062) (manga)

Following the life of the student newspaper reporter Emiko, these are scary stories of experiences from Miyako High School :  
- Ubawareta Shinzou (Stolen Heart) – The school's mystery club sees the dangerous consequences of an innocent promise concerning heart donation after death between two friends.   
- Kyuuketsu Men (Bloodsucking Mask) – A girl who wears a demon mask from a shrine for a bad-luck-banishing drama club party ends up unable to remove it.   
- Dokuga (Poison Moth) – The science club leader creates a serum to preserve dead bodies perfectly, but it may have other unpredicted side effects.   
- Henshitsu – A couple take shelter from a storm in a strange house with a secret that might prove to be deadly.   
– These stories and many more are found in the two volumes of Kyoufu. [tethysdust]

title.en: The Snow Leopard Baby of the Black Leopard Family

description.en: A child, born a hybrid and abused to death by their grandfather, is reborn with memories of their past life. Faced with the same fate, they seek out their estranged father for protection until adulthood. Expecting rejection, they are instead met with love and acceptance from their father, siblings, and grandfather—who even offers them the family leadership.
It was published on the 232nd issue (No. 33 1973) of Weekly Shonen Jump (週刊少年ジャンプ) on July 30, 1973, after it became a runner-up in the 5th Tezuka Award.

Sophie, a boy with vampire and human blood, is transferred from an orphanage to an institution called Clan. The school houses vampire boys who have reached their Cocoon period, or puberty in human terms. Sophie has a fateful encounter with a boy named Ul while being coldly greeted by the vampires around him. As Ul continues to research the “power of immortality” that vampires once possessed, he learns of the existence of TRUMP, the original vampire that is said to live forever, and begins to crave eternal life.

Eventually, Sophie and Ul become entangled in the deep fate surrounding the legend of immortality...

A manga adaptation of the origin story of playwright Kenichi Suemitsu’s popular series! A Gothic school fantasy that beautifully spins the conflicts of impressionable and sensitive boysー!
description.ja: 吸血種<ヴァンプ>と人間の血が流れる少年ソフィは、養護院からクランと呼ばれる施設へと入所した。そこは繭期――人間でいうところの思春期を迎えた吸血種の少年たちが集う学園。周囲の吸血種から冷ややかな目で迎えられる中、ソフィはある一人の少年と運命的な出会いを果たす。劇作家・末満健一の人気シリーズの原点となる物語をコミック化!! 繊細かつ多感な少年たちの葛藤を美しく紡ぎ出すゴシック学園ファンタジー!
description.vi: Câu chuyện xoay quanh Sophie Anderson - một con lai giữa con người và ma cà rồng (Dhampir), bị khinh ghét vì sự không thuần khiết. Tuy vậy, Sophie vẫn vượt lên những trở ngại với trái tim cao quý và luôn đầy tự hào về dòng máu của mình.

title.en: Touhou Bougetsushou ~ Silent Sinner in Blue.

altTitles.de: Östliches Zitat des Flüchtigen Mondes ~ Silent Sinner in Blue

altTitles.en: Touhou Bougetsushou ~ Silent Sinner in Blue

altTitles.ja: 東方儚月抄 ~ Silent Sinner in Blue

description.en:
東方儚月抄 (romanized Touhou Bougetsushou, meaning Eastern Ephemeral Moon Vignette) is a loosely interconnected storyline about the Lunarians that includes Silent Sinner in Blue, Cage in Lunatic Runagate, and Inaba of the Moon and Inaba of the Earth.

---
Official Release:
- Indonesian release by Elex Media
description.pt:
Yukari Yakumo, a youkai das fronteiras, ela compareceu descontraída enquanto bebia o chá no Santuário Hakurei, ela pediu para que a sacerdotisa estudasse sobre a divinação para futuros eventos. A sacerdotisa achou a idéia maluca da Youkai e levou por brincadeira os planos da Youkai.  
Logo depois, Yukari montou uma invasão contra lua há mais de 1000 anos atrás, porém, o seu plano não deu certo, agora, ela pede auxilio para os Youkais residentes de Gensokyo para mais uma tentativa de invasão.

description.en:
At the risk of his own life, a young man sets foot in the ruins of a devastated old world. His name is Akira, and in order to claw his way out of the hellhole that is his birthplace of Slumtown, the boy became a hunter. In the wastelands he happens upon a strange woman, standing perfectly still, stark naked.   
She is beautiful, but it seems that only he can see her. She exists incorporeal, tantalizingly beyond any touch, and she tells him her name is Alpha.  
Alpha won’t show even a sliver of her real intentions, but with a wide smile, she brings Akira his first commission as a hunter. Akira takes the task, if only to become a stronger hunter, and having entered a contract, their dramatic lives in the hunting profession was set to begin.  
  
From Stories of the Boy Hunter as recorded by the Eastern Hunters’ association.  
Written post-collapse of scientific civilization.

altTitles.ja: ヴァンパイア様の不味いご馳走

description.en: "Without further ado, I shall receive your blood.” At a vampire auction where human blood is sold, Nicholas, blood rank D, is unexpectedly purchased by the elite vampire Xenon for 10 million yen. Initially, Xenon seems arrogant, but as Nicholas sees his unexpected side, he starts to open up to him. Meanwhile, Nicholas becomes concerned about only receiving blood transfusions and not being directly sucked by blood. Will this lead to something more? A "vampire contract love" brought to you by the ultimate tag team of Aiba Moko and Sakai Yukari!

It's the 1920s and Mariko, age 16, is married to a man 30 years her senior. She is honestly happy 
to be his wife and really excited to board the Orient express in Turkey on their honeymoon trip. 
But her life takes a rapid turn when her husband is discovered dead after the first night on board… 
And that's only the start of Mariko's great adventure.

altTitles.ja: なんか変わってしまった幼なじみ

altTitles.en: A Childhood Friend Who's Somehow Oddly Changed

altTitles.vi: Sự thay đổi của bạn thuở nhỏ

altTitles.en: My Childhood Friend Has Oddly Changed

altTitles.vi: Người bạn thuở nhỏ của tôi đã thay đổi một cách kì lạ

altTitles.ja: オトナを知りたい女友達
My Galpals are Cumming of Age

altTitles.en: My Galpal Wants An Adult Understanding
My Girl Friend Wants An Adult Understanding

description.en:
20-year-old Sawatari Tatsurou is a male college student. While others around him are rejoicing in the springtime of their youth, he's enjoying his solitary life to the fullest. He has a noble hobby. Which is… appreciating lewd vide*s. “I don't need a girlfriend. Because I have AVs”. A fulfilling everyday where he continuously releases his male desires with his exceptional AV love…… However one day, his classmate and gal galpal Kaniko Eimi witnesses him cranking it at his place!

Then, she says something shocking to Tatsurou, who thinks the world is ending.

“I-is it fine if I watch the AV together with you……?”

Watch it together with your innocent galpal with an immoral atmosphere! A vid-life story where male desires are laid bare with a gal!
___
**Alt Official Raw:** [niconico Manga](https://manga.nicovideo.jp/watch/mg878860)

"In this realm mythological creatures roam, descendant of the nine heavens they call home." 

Sibuxiang, a mythical deer-man couch potato, is kicked out of heaven and assigned to support the mythological creatures wandering the human world. He meets and goes on adventures with his friends: the energetic, food loving Pixiu named Pipi, the fanatic moon bunny Tuye, the banished-from-heaven mouse brothers Jinjiao and Yinjiao, and many others. What kind of adventures will they take on?
description.zh:
《人间有神兽，来自九重天 》

随着科技的发展，往日威风凛凛的神兽们日子大不如前。神兽四不像奉命下凡，去解救流落人间的落魄神兽。在凡间，他遇到了走投无路的老同事天禄，不得志的酒友兔爷，被贬下凡的金银角兄弟……从此开启了一段新的旅程。
description.es-la:
"En este reino, criaturas mitológicas deambulan, descendientes de los nueve cielos que llaman hogar."
Sibuxiang, un hombre-ciervo mitológico y perezoso, es expulsado del cielo y asignado a apoyar a las criaturas mitológicas que vagan por el mundo humano. Conoce y vive aventuras con sus amigos: el enérgico Pixiu amante de la comida llamado Pipi, el fanático conejo lunar Tony, los hermanos ratones Jinjiao y Yinjiao, también desterrados del cielo, y muchos otros. ¿Qué tipo de aventuras emprenderán?

altTitles.ja: うちのメイドがウザすぎる！

altTitles.en: UzaMaid: Our Maid Is Way Too Annoying!

description.en:
Former Air Force Master Sergeant Kamoi Tsubame tries changing careers to finally get cute girls to wear her cute self-designed clothes. To that end she tries to get a job in the Takanashi household as a maid and babysitter to Yasuhiro Takanashi's spoiled daughter Misha Takanashi, as it seems that her mother is no longer present.  
  
Misha has successfully gotten rid of previous maids through playing devastating pranks like throwing mud, laying out banana peels to slip on and lighting the washed clothes on fire. In face of the newest applicant boasting that she has military experience, Misha even thinks about researching bomb making.
description.ja: 母を亡くし父と二人で暮らす小学生女子・ミーシャ。そんな父子家庭にやってきた新人家政婦は、やたらマッチョな上に三度の飯より幼女が大好きで…！？

title.en: Chiisai Koro kara Kizuite Kita Futari no Kankei-sei ga Kawatta Hanashi

altTitles.ja: 小さいころから築いてきた二人の関係性が変わった話

altTitles.en: A Story About How the Relationship Between Two People That They Had Built Since Childhood, Changed

description.en:
The new series from Ken Wakui, the creator of Shinjuku Swan and Tokyo Revengers!

As the battle to decide the next leader of the Yotsurugi gang that runs Asakusa is heating up, a meteorite strike suddenly awakens superpowers in the people of Japan. How will Hibaru Yotsurugi, the son of the previous gang leader, come out of this?!
description.fr: Le nouveau manga de Ken Wakui, le créateur de Shinjuku Swan et Tokyo Revengers ! Alors que la bataille pour désigner le prochain chef du clan Yotsurugi qui dirige Asakusa s'intensifie, la chute d'une météorite réveille soudainement des super-pouvoirs chez les Japonais. Comment Hibaru Yotsurugi, le fils du précédent boss du clan va-t-il s'en sortir ?

title.en: Sekai de Ichiban "Kawaii" Amamiya-san, Nibanme wa Ore.

altTitles.ja: 世界で一番『可愛い』雨宮さん、二番目は俺。

altTitles.en: The World's Most "Cutest" is Amamiya-san, and the Second is Me.

altTitles.id: Yang Paling " IMUT" di Dunia adalah Amamiya-san, dan Yang Kedua adalah Aku.

altTitles.vi: Người “dễ thương” nhất thế giới là Amamiya, đứng thứ hai là tôi.

description.en: Hikari, a highly popular model hailed as the "Cutest Girl in the World"... The mysterious model turned out to be an ordinary high school student named Harema Kouki! Kouki is troubled by the fact that he feels he's too cute when cross-dressing and can't find other girls cute... But by a twist of fate, he realizes that his classmate, Amamiya-san, is much cuter than him—!?
description.id: Hikari, model yang sangat populer dan dijuluki sebagai "Gadis Termanis di Dunia" Model misterius ini ternyata seorang siswa SMA biasa bernama Harema Kouki! Kouki merasa terganggu oleh fakta bahwa dia merasa dirinya terlalu imut ketika ber-crossdressing dan tidak dapat menemukan gadis-gadis lain yang imut... Namun, karena takdir, dia menyadari bahwa teman sekelasnya, Amamiya-san, jauh lebih imut darinya! Seorang anak laki-laki yang terlalu percaya diri saat Crossdresser × seorang gadis rajin yang bersinar saat dipoles, Komedi romantis anak muda yang dipenuhi dengan "keimutan" -!
description.ja:
「君は俺より可愛い！つまり世界で一番可愛い！」

『世界一可愛い女の子』と称される大人気美少女モデルのhikari――。謎に包まれた彼女の正体はどこにでもいる普通の高校生、晴間光輝だった！女装した自分が可愛すぎて他の女子を可愛いと思えないことに悩んでいる光輝だったが、ある日クラスメイトの地味で冴えない雨宮さんが自分より『可愛い』ことに気づいてしまい――!?
description.vi: Hikari, một người mẫu rất nổi tiếng với biệt danh "cô gái dễ thương nhất thế giới" hóa ra là một học sinh trung học tên Kouki. Cậu lo sợ rằng mình sẽ không thích ai được nữa bởi vì làm gì có người con gái nào dễ thương hơn mình. Nhưng đọc lại tên truyện đi ông nhõi, chú mày xếp thứ 2 thôi.

title.en: The 53 Year Old Online Gamer's First IRL Meet-Up

altTitles.ja: 53歳で初めてオフ会に参加しました

altTitles.ja-ro: 53-sai de Hajimete Off-kai ni Sanka Shimashita

description.en:
Let's go to the offline meet-up with online gaming friends!

"MAKOTO" is a middle-aged man and newbie gamer who's excited for his offline meeting with "Ao", a veteran adventurer who has always been helping him out. However, the one who appeared for the meeting was... an elementary school boy!?

Through posting a "Best Comment", I somehow became the main character of a webtoon!

---

- BGM done by [<Team MSD>](https://www.youtube.com/c/TeamMSD/search?query=%ED%94%8C%EB%A0%88%EC%9D%B4%EC%96%B4)

---

- [Official Japanese Translation](https://manga.line.me/product/periodic?id=Z0000964)

- [Official French Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/fr/fantasy/player/list?title_no=2985)

- [Official Thai Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/th/fantasy/player/list?title_no=2649)
description.fr:
Seoljin est un vrai loser à l'école : il est méprisé par tous, même par ceux qu'il croyait être ses amis. La seule chose qu'il puisse faire pour échapper à cette dure réalité, c'est de lire des webtoons d'action, de s'imaginer à la place des héros qui se battent courageusement contre leurs adversaires, sans la moindre hésitation. Mais la vie de Seoljin va prendre un tout autre tournant lorsqu'il laissera un petit commentaire sur le webtoon "Player" : un commentaire qui, bientôt, le conduira dans l'univers-même de ce webtoon !

---

- BGM done by [<Team MSD>](https://www.youtube.com/c/TeamMSD/search?query=%ED%94%8C%EB%A0%88%EC%9D%B4%EC%96%B4)

---

- [Official Indonesian Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/id/fantasy/player/list?title_no=2256)

- [Official Japanese Translation](https://manga.line.me/product/periodic?id=Z0000964)

- [Official French Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/fr/fantasy/player/list?title_no=2985)

- [Official Thai Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/th/fantasy/player/list?title_no=2649)
description.id:
Seoljin, seorang pecundang di sekolah, tiba-tiba masuk ke dalam dunia webtoon aksi karena dia berjanji untuk masuk ke webtoon berjudul “Player” kalau kommennya menjadi komen terbaik! Gimana nasibnya di dalam dunia webtoon?!

---

- BGM done by [<Team MSD>](https://www.youtube.com/c/TeamMSD/search?query=%ED%94%8C%EB%A0%88%EC%9D%B4%EC%96%B4)

---

- [Official Indonesian Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/id/fantasy/player/list?title_no=2256)

- [Official Japanese Translation](https://manga.line.me/product/periodic?id=Z0000964)

- [Official French Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/fr/fantasy/player/list?title_no=2985)

- [Official Thai Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/th/fantasy/player/list?title_no=2649)
description.ja:
先の展開が見え見えの漫画なんてもう飽きた！漫画好きの男子高校生・松雪仁は現実の高校生活に、そして自分の弱さにうんざりしていた。そのうっぷんを晴らすべくコメント欄に書き込んだ他愛のない一つの公約。それをきっかけに彼は現実世界から自分が読み入る漫画の世界に強制送還されることに⁉ こんな展開みたことない！この漫画の主人公は俺だ！

---

- BGM done by [<Team MSD>](https://www.youtube.com/c/TeamMSD/search?query=%ED%94%8C%EB%A0%88%EC%9D%B4%EC%96%B4)

ฉันเกลียดเวลาที่ตัวเอกในเว็บตูนถูกเขียนให้แพ้คู่ต่อสู้ที่แข็งแกร่งเพราะว่า...การแพ้ที่เป็นอยู่ตอนนี้ก็มากเกินพอแล้ว ฉันเองก็อยากเป็นตัวเอกของเรื่องเหมือนกัน!

description.vi: 1 học sinh cấp 3 luôn bị các bạn trong lớp xa lánh , đọc webtoon là thứ giúp cậu bớt tuổi thân nhưng 1 hôm cậu cmt vào bộ truyện cậu thích và có khá nhiều lượt tương tác, vị THẦN đã tạo ra bộ truyện cậu đọc thấy cmt cậu rất thú vị mà đã dịch chuyển cậu vào thế giới của bộ truyện.....
description.zh:
弱鸡少年穿越到漫画世界！
打败NO.1才能回到现实？
内向的男主许镇是学校里的边缘人物。作为一个漫画迷，某天他看到一部漫画，却很反感故事里主角先被强者碾压再崛起的老套设定。于是在评论中留言吐槽并许下了“承诺”，没想到这条评论成为了热评第一。之后不可思议的事情发生了！他竟被漫画里的“神——亚瑟”带进了漫画世界！并且只有当他代替漫画世界里的主角成为所谓的“player排行No.1”，他才能回到现实世界。菜鸟玩家该如何成为最强玩家呢？

---

- BGM done by [<Team MSD>](https://www.youtube.com/c/TeamMSD/search?query=%ED%94%8C%EB%A0%88%EC%9D%B4%EC%96%B4)

---

description.pt-br: Depois de postar um “Melhor Comentário”, de alguma forma eu me tornei o personagem principal de uma webtoon!

title.en: The Fragrant Flower Blooms with Dignity

altTitles.es-la: La fragante flor florece con dignidad

altTitles.pl: Kaoru i Rin. Rozkwitając z tobą

altTitles.th: ดอกรักผลิบานที่กลางใจ

altTitles.vi: Những đóa hoa thơm nở diễm kiều

altTitles.ja-ro: Kaoru Hana wa Rin to Saku

description.en:
In a certain place, there are two neighboring high schools. Chidori High School, a bottom-feeder boys' school where idiots gather, and Kikyo Girls' School, a well-established girls' school. Rintaro Tsumugi, a strong and quiet second year student at Chidori High School, meets Kaoruko Waguri, a girl who comes as a customer while helping out at his family's cake shop. Rintaro feels comfortable spending time with Kaoruko, but she is a student at Kikyo Girls, a neighboring school that thoroughly dislikes Chidori High.
___
**Links:**
- [Official Twitter (JP)](https://twitter.com/kaoruhana_mp)
- Official English - [K MANGA](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10023/episode/320130) (U.S. Only | Simulpub)
description.fr:
Bien qu'ils soient mitoyens, le lycée public Chidori pour garçons et le prestigieux lycée privé pour filles Kikyō continuent à entretenir leur tradition de se haïr mutuellement au plus haut point. Tsumugi Rintarō pensait la même chose, jusqu'à ce qu'il fasse la rencontre de Wakuri Kaoruko, élève de Chidori et habituée de la pâtisserie tenue par ses parents. Malgré la désapprobation et les préjugés de leurs camarades respectifs, Rintarō et Kaoruko vont petit à petit se rapprocher, et tant pis ce qu'en pensent les autres !

___
**Liens :**
- [Official Twitter (JP)](https://twitter.com/kaoruhana_mp)
- Official English - [K MANGA](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10023/episode/320130) (U.S. Only | Simulpub)
description.ja:
とある場所に、隣接するふたつの高校がある。バカが集まる底辺男子校・千鳥高校と、由緒正しきお嬢様校・桔梗女子。そこに通う紬 凛太郎と、和栗薫子が出会い…。
“近くて遠い”二人が織りなす、鮮やかな青春彩る学園物語!!

とある場所に、隣接するふたつの高校がある。バカが集まる底辺男子校・千鳥高校と、由緒正しきお嬢様校・桔梗女子。強面で物静かな千鳥高校2年・紬 凛太郎は、実家のケーキ屋の手伝い中にお客として来ていた少女・和栗薫子と出会う。薫子との時間を心地よく感じる凛太郎だったが、彼女は徹底して千鳥を嫌う桔梗女子の生徒で……!?

___
- [Twitter](https://twitter.com/kaoruhana_mp)
description.vi: Ở một nơi nào đó, có 2 trường cao trung lân cận. Cao trung Chidori, một trường nam sinh cấp thấp hội tụ đủ những thằng đần, trường nữ sinh Kikyo, một trường nữ sinh danh giá . Rintaro Tsugumi, một nam sinh năm 2 to khỏe và trầm tính tại trường Chidori, bắt gặp Kaoruko Waguri, một khách hàng khi cậu đang giúp việc tại cửa hàng bánh nhà mình . Rintaro cảm thấy thoải mái khi dành thời gian bên Kaoruko, nhưng cô lại là học sinh của trường Kikyo, ngôi trường hàng xóm cực kì căm ghét trường Chidori. Đây là câu chuyện về 2 con người ở rất gần nhưng lại rất xa
description.es-la:
En cierto lugar, hay dos escuelas secundarias vecinas. El instituto Chidori, una escuela masculina de mala muerte en la que se reúnen los idiotas, y el instituto femenino Kikyo, una escuela femenina bien establecida. Rintaro Tsumugi, un fuerte y tranquilo estudiante de segundo curso del instituto Chidori, conoce a Kaoruko Wakuri, una chica que llega como cliente mientras ayuda en la pastelería de su familia. Rintaro se siente cómodo pasando tiempo con Kaoruko, pero ella es alumna de las chicas de Kikyo, una escuela vecina a la que no le gusta nada el instituto Chidori. Esta es la historia de dos personas que están tan cerca y a la vez tan lejos.
___
- [Twitter Oficial (JA)](https://twitter.com/kaoruhana_mp)
description.pt-br: Em um lugar específico, existem duas escolas secundárias vizinhas. A Escola Secundária Chidori, uma escola para rapazes considerada de nível inferior, onde se reúnem estudantes menos dedicados, e a Escola para Meninas Kikyo, uma instituição bem estabelecida. Rintaro Tsumugi, um estudante do segundo ano forte e tranquilo da Escola Secundária Chidori, conhece Kaoruko Waguri, uma garota que aparece como cliente enquanto ajuda na confeitaria da sua família. Rintaro se sente à vontade passando tempo com Kaoruko, mas ela é uma aluna da Escola para Meninas Kikyo, uma escola vizinha que tem aversão à Escola Secundária Chidori. Esta é a história de duas pessoas que estão tão próximas e, ao mesmo tempo, tão distantes.

description.en:
*A spin-off of the YuruYuri series featuring the Oomuro family of sisters!*

From oldest to youngest, there's **Nadeshiko**, the cool and serious high schooler; **Sakurako**, the silly, lazy, and (slightly) dimwitted middle schooler; and **Hanako**, the intelligent and mature elementary schooler! 

This story focuses on these three sisters, their friends. and the many fun and wild adventures they have together!
description.ja: 優秀な長女・撫子、残念な次女・櫻子、優秀な三女・花子からなる大室家３姉妹。自由奔放な櫻子を中心に今日も大室さん家は賑やかです♪

title.en: Isekai Sniper wa Onna Senshi no Mofumofu Aigan Doubutsu

altTitles.ja: 異世界狙撃手は女戦士のモフモフ愛玩動物

altTitles.en: A Sniper From Another World is Turned Into The Female Warrior's Fluffy Pet
Another World Sniper is Female Warrior's Mof-Moffy Pet

description.en: A gun otaku dies after toying with a homemade pistol that explodes in his face. In the afterlife, he is told that he will be reincarnated into another world. When the otaku wakes up, he finds that he is no longer human - he’s now just some little furry thing. Near death, he comes across a beautiful warrior, who decides to take care of him because he’s fluffy. However, things take a turn when he finds out that firearms exist in this world?
description.ja: 非モテで金のない銃マニアの31歳のオッサンが異世界転生！でも変なモフモフのぬいぐるみっぽいモンスターに転生していた!?突如現れた女戦士と出会い一緒に冒険することに…!?銃マニアだった知識が異世界で役に立つ!?モフモフ異世界転生ファンタジー！

altTitles.en: Amano Megumi is Full of Gaps!
Amano Megumi is FULL of Openings!

altTitles.th: เรื่องหนักอกของอามาโนะ เมกุมิ!

altTitles.ja: 天野めぐみはスキだらけ!

description.en: Shindo Manabu is a student at a very prestigious high school whose goal is to get into Tokyo University. He studies constantly and tries to never lose sight of that goal. That is until his childhood friend, Amano Megumi, who goes to the same school starts to distract him. He originally only remembered her as the tomboy she was as a kid, until he notices how "developed" she has become. As these two get closer to each other, hilarity often ensues and subsequently, Manabu becomes more and more distracted from his goal of getting into Tokyo U.
description.ja: 剣道に打ち込む体育会系ぷに子・めぐみと、東大志望のひょろ長男子・学──幼なじみの二人は中学で疎遠になるも、同じ高校に進学して再び距離を縮めはじめた。プラスとマイナス、N極とS極──真逆な二人は引かれ合う…？
description.pt-br: Shindo Manabu é um estudante de uma escola de ensino médio muito prestigiada cujo objetivo é entrar na Universidade de Tóquio. Ele estuda constantemente e tenta nunca perder de vista este objetivo. Isso até que sua amiga de infância, Amano Megumi, que frequenta a mesma escola, começa a distraí-lo. Ele originalmente só se lembrava dela como a moleca que ela era quando criança, até perceber o quão “desenvolvida” ela se tornou. À medida que esses dois se aproximam, a hilaridade geralmente acontece e, posteriormente, Manabu se torna cada vez mais distraído de seu objetivo de entrar na Universidade de Tóquio.

description.en:
Nishioka Kyoudai's anti-war epic, told in their signature surrealist style.   
  
A man wakes up one morning to find the world outside of his house a wasteland. As he searches for signs of life, he finds a fetus in a ditch, which promptly latches onto his thumb and won't let go, and things only get stranger from there…

Uehara-kun, who loves 2D, dreams of becoming a comic artist one day! However, his dream is threatened when an editor rejects his work as too boring. The next day, while contemplating giving up on his dream, a gal in his class, Miyamoto Niina, sees his manuscript, and a too-close pseudo-romance for the sake of their comics begins!?
description.id: Uehara-kun menyukai karakter 2 dimensi dan mempunyai cita-cita menjadi mangaka! Namun, mimpinya pupus saat seorang editor menolak manga-nya karena bikin ngantuk. Besoknya, dia berencana membuang manga yang ditolak tersebut, namun, salah satu gadis dari kelasnya, Miyamoto Niina, mengetahui manga hasil buatannya, timbulah kisah komedi-romantis yang terjalin dari sebuah manga!
description.ja: 2次元をこよなく愛する上原くんの夢は漫画家！ ある日、同じクラスのギャル宮本さんに自分の原稿を見られたことで漫画のための距離感近すぎ疑似恋愛、開始!?
description.vi:
Uehara-kun là một thằng rất thích gái 2D và ước mơ làm hoạ sĩ Manga! Tuy nhiên, giấc mơ của anh ta lại ngay lập tức bị đạp đổ khi bị một biên tập viên nhận xét rằng tác phẩm này nhìn chán chả buồn nói.

Tưởng như anh đã định từ bỏ giấc mơ của mình thì một cô gái trong lớp của anh, Miyamoto Niina, nhìn thấy bản phác thảo của cậu ấy và muốn bắt đầu một mối tình tưởng lãng mạn nhưng ai ngờ là giả tạo, để giúp cậu hoàn thành được bộ manga của mình!

Một bộ manga về Mangaka ✖ Romcom tuổi mới lớn!
description.pt-br:
Uehara-kun, que adora 2D, sonha em se tornar um mangaká um dia! No entanto, seu sonho é ameaçado quando um editor rejeita seu trabalho por considerá-lo muito chato.

No dia seguinte, enquanto pensa em desistir de seu sonho, uma garota de sua turma, Miyamoto Niina, vê seu manuscrito, e um pseudo-romance muito próximo para o bem de seus mangás começa!?

Esta é uma comédia romântica juvenil de quadrinistas!

title.en: Yarinaoshi Reijou wa Ryuutei Heika wo Kouryaku-chuu

altTitles.ja: やり直し令嬢は竜帝陛下を攻略中

altTitles.en: The Do-Over Damsel Conquers the Dragon Emperor

altTitles.zh: 重生大小姐正在攻略龙帝殿下

altTitles.id: Seorang Putri Yang Kembali Ke Masa Lalu Sedang Menaklukkan Kaisar Naga

altTitles.it: La nobildonna ritornata nel bel mezzo della conquista di Sua Maestà l'Imperatore Drago

altTitles.es: ¡Vence al Emperador Dragón en esta ronda, Señorita!

altTitles.vi: Tiểu Thư Trùng Sinh chinh phục Long Đế Bệ Hạ
小姐重生征服龍帝陛下 (Nom Script)

description.en: The curtains rise on the tale of a young lady who once stormed the battlefields now getting to start her life all over again! The young noblewoman, Jill, was sentenced to death by her fiancé, the Crown Prince. Just as she was on the brink of death, time rewinds back to when she was 10 years old, to the party where her engagement had been decided! Determined to avoid going down the same path to ruin, Jill hastily proposes to the person behind her, only to discover that he’s none other than Hades, the Emperor of the neighboring kingdom who’s (set to) fall into darkness, ergo the worst villain.
description.id:
Jill Savelle- seorang tunangan dari pangeran putra mahkota Gerald de Kleitos yang memiliki gelar "Dewi Perang"- telah diburu oleh negaranya sendiri yang telah dilindunginya. Dikhianati oleh pasangannya sendiri, dia difitnah sebagai sorang penghianat kemudian dijebloskan kedalam penjara. Di waktu-waktu terakhirnya, Jill memiliki banyak penyesalan, tapi ketika ajal sedang menjemputnya, dia tiba-tiba saja terbangun pada saat 6 tahun lalu. Dan kali ini, dia telah bertekad untuk tidak diperalat lagi.

Sekarang, sebagai seorang gadis berusia 10 tahun, Jill memutuskan untuk melarikan diri dari pertunangan dengan pangeran yang menghampirinya. Dan pada akhirnya, dia secara tidak sengaja melamar pria berumur 19 tahun yang dikenal sebagai kaisar naga hades theos rave, yang nantinya akan menghancurkan negaranya. Tapi tanpa disangka, dia malah menerima lamarannya!

Berbanding terbalik dengan ingatan Jill yang dulu, sekarang Jill melihat kalau Hades yang saat ini merupakan seorang kaisar yang sedang tidak beruntung.  Jadi bisakah Jill mencegah sang kaisar terjatuh kedalam jurang kegelapan? ataukah malah nasibnya sudah tidak bisa diubah lagi?
description.ja: 婚約者の王太子から処刑を言い渡された令嬢・ジル。その死の間際に、婚約が決まった当時10歳のパーティーまで時が巻き戻る！破滅ルートを回避するべくとっさに後ろにいた人に求婚するが、相手は最大の敵、隣国の闇落ち（予定）皇帝・ハディスだった――。「あなたを必ず更生――いえ、しあわせにいたします。」

altTitles.ja: 愛してるゲームを終わらせたい

altTitles.en: I Want to End This Love Game

altTitles.fr: Je veux finir le jeu du "je t'aime"

altTitles.th: เกมสารภาพรักนี้น่ะเรามาจบกันเถอะ

altTitles.zh: 想让“我爱你”游戏快点结束

altTitles.fr: Je veux en finir avec le jeu de l'amour

altTitles.nl: Ik wil een einde aan het liefdesspel

altTitles.pt-br: Eu quero acabar com o jogo do "eu te amo"

altTitles.en: I Want to End the "I Love You" Game
I Want to End the Game That I Love

description.en: Childhood friends who have been together since they were little. They both realize their feelings for each other, but are too close to be honest. What connects them is the "I love you game" that they have been playing since they were little. The end of their love is decided in this simple game where the winner is the one who makes the other embarrassed!
description.vi: Đôi bạn thuở nhỏ luôn ở bên nhau từ khi cả 2 còn bé. Cả 2 đều nhận ra tình cảm của nhau, nhưng họ quá thân thiết nên không thể thành thực. Thứ kết nối họ là trò chơi "Tớ yêu cậu" mà cả 2 đã chơi hồi còn nhỏ . Kết cục tình yêu của họ sẽ được quyết định bằng trò chơi đơn giản này khi người chiến thắng là người khiến người kia phải xấu hổ.
description.es-la: Se conocen desde que eran niños. Ambos son conscientes de lo que sienten el uno por el otro, pero están demasiado unidos como para ser sinceros. Lo único que les une es el juego "Te quiero" al que juegan desde pequeños. Si haces pasar vergüenza a tu compañero, ¡ganas!
description.pt-br: Amigos de infância que estão juntos desde que eram pequenos. Eles percebem seus sentimentos pelo outro, mas são muito próximos para serem honestos. O que os conecta é seu “jogo do eu te amo”, que eles brincam desde que eram pequenos. O fim do seu amor é decidido nesse jogo simples onde o vencedor é aquele que deixa o outro com vergonha!

altTitles.ja: かわいそうな妹ちゃん
お兄ちゃんの恋人になりたい妹の話

altTitles.ja-ro: Onii-chan no Koibito ni Naritai Imouto no Hanashi

description.en: Poor little sister who loves her onii-chan
description.pl: Biedna młodsza siostrzyczka, która zakochała się w swoim bracie
description.vi: Cô em gái đáng thương phải lòng anh trai mình
description.pt-br: Pobre irmãzinha que arma seu onii-chan

description.en: Hana is a child who is known by the public as a genetically modified mouse. This is the story of what happens after Hana escapes from the lab.
description.ko:
유전자조작 쥐로 알려져 있는 아이 HANA(하나),
하나가 연구실에서 탈출하면서 일어나는 이야기들.

altTitles.ja: 恋とか夢とかてんてんてん

description.en:
Kai-chan is a 29-year-old part-time worker who moved to Tokyo 10 years ago with dreams in mind. She is busy making a living, and time just passes by. She even gave up drawing, something she loved, because it was painful when she didn't get any "likes" from anyone when she posted her pictures on social media. Meanwhile, Kai-chan falls in love and moves from Tokyo to Osaka! A story of love and dreams that keeps rolling in for Kai-chan, whose first unrequited love of her life is unstoppable.

2nd placer of the women's edition of "Kono Manga ga Sugoi! 2025", just behind the winner "Tamaki & Amane".

Yumewo is such a negative pessimist that his power to see the future in his dreams only lets him see bad things that will happen to him. In a world where nothing goes right for him, can Yumewo remake himself to become a more positive person?  
  
Originally published in Big Comic Spirits in 2011 to celebrate the magazine's 30th anniversary.

title.en: Tonari no Seki no Yatsu ga Souiu Me de Mitekuru

altTitles.ja: となりの席のヤツがそういう目で見てくる

altTitles.es-la: La persona sentada a mi lado me mira de esa manera
La persona de al lado me mira con esos ojos

altTitles.uk: Однокласниця що сидить біля мене, дивиться на мене хтивими очима

altTitles.en: The weirdo one desk over keeps giving me THAT kind of look

altTitles.ur: Sath ki kursi par beithne wali mujhe "Un Ankhoñ" se deikhti he

description.en: Of course, viewers are excited, but will those being watched feel the same excitement...?
description.ja: 主人公の池沢くんは、同じクラスの美少女・江口さんのことを「そういう目」で見ている。しかし実は、江口さんも「そういう目」で池沢くんのことを見ていて！？チラ見えする筋肉、汗ばむ肌、髪の香り…互いに興味津々な2人の「下心」から始まる純愛ラブコメ！好きな人のなら、臭いも汗も×××も…全部好き。

description.en:
A spin-off work starring Kamui, one of the main characters of Kamui-den.

The first 2 volumes were published in a Shounen magazine and ended with the 20th chapter in 1971. The manga changed art style and direction when it switched to a Seinen publication in 1988. The violent and sexual explicit part of the narrative was the basis for the American adaptation by Eclipse Comics in the 1980s and its unedited Viz re-release in 1999.
description.ja: 抜け忍・カムイの始末のため、日置領・竹間沢近辺の探索を命じられた三人の追忍。辻風のドド、矢張のソネ、荒草のハヤネと名乗る彼らは、それぞれ手裏剣、弓、吹き矢を得手としていたが、探索の傍ら、誰がスズメの群れを一度にたくさん打ち落とせるかを競い合うことに。すると、それを見ていた謎の乞食が「自分なら武器など使わず、もっとたくさん落とせる」と言い寄ってきて…。

altTitles.th: AOASHI แข้งเด็กหัวใจนักสู้

description.de: Aoi Ashito ist ein Mittelschüler im dritten Jahr aus Ehime. Hinter seinem rohen Spiel verbirgt sich sein immenses Talent, aber Ashito erleidet wegen seiner allzu geradlinigen Persönlichkeit einen großen Rückschlag. Der Manager der Jugendmannschaft des J1-Clubs Tokyo City Esperion, Fukuda Tetsuya, erscheint vor Ashito. Fukuda sieht Ashitos grenzenloses Potenzial und lädt ihn ein, an den Probespielen seines Teams in Tokio teilzunehmen. Die Geschichte des Jungen, der den Fußball in Japan revolutionieren wird, beginnt sich schnell zu entfalten.
description.en:
Aoi Ashito is a third year middle school student from Ehime. Behind his raw game hides his immense talent 
but Ashito suffers a huge setback because of his overly straightforward personality. 
One day the youth team manager of J1 club Tokyo City Esperion, Fukuda Tetsuya, appears in front of him. 
Fukuda sees his limitless potential and invites him to take part in his team's tryouts in Tokyo. 
The story of the boy who will revolutionize football in Japan rapidly begins to unfold.  
  
---
- **Won the 65th Shogakukan Manga Award for General Manga in 2019**
description.ru: Ашито Аой, ученик третьего класса средней школы из префектуры Эхиме, встречает тренера «Молодежной лиги J» Фукуду Тацую. Несмотря на свою грубость, Ашито обладает таким удивительным потенциалом, что тренер Фукуда приглашает его принять участие в отборочных тестах своей команды в Токио. Взгляните на историю мальчика, который совершит революцию в японском футболе.
description.tr: Aoi Ashito Ehime'de ortaokul 3. sınıfa giden bir öğrencidir. Bir gün karşısına J1 Ligi kulübü Tokyo City Esperion'un altyapı takımı menajeri Fukuda Tetsuya çıkar. Fukuda Aoi'nin sonsuz potansiyelini farkeder ve onu Tokyo'daki altyapı seçmelerine davet eder. Böylece Japon futbolunda devrim yapacak çocuğun hikayesi başlar.
description.pt-br: Ashito Aoi, um estudante do terceiro ano do ensino médio de Ehime, conhece Fukuda Tatsuya, um treinador da "J Youth League". Mesmo que ainda tenha uma personalidade forte, Ashito tem um incrível potêncial que o fez ser convidado pelo treinador Fukuda para participar da seleção de sua equipe em Tóquio. A história do garoto que vai revolucionar o futebol no Japão vai começar.

altTitles.ja: きみの横顔を見ていた

altTitles.en: I See Your Face, Turned Away

description.en: Hikari's your typical freshmen in high school who's been recently daydreaming about Mari’s, her shy best friend, a love story. She decides to ship Mari with Ootani-kun, their classmate, after finding out about his crush on Mari when his friend, Asagiri-kun, tried getting the two to talk. The main character is Mari, the leading man is Ootani, and Hikari is the typical best friend in the story. Not bad… right? A youthful story between four kids going through unrequited love.
description.fr:
Nous suivons le quotidien de quatre lycéens, deux filles et deux garçons, sur leur amitié parfois compliquée et leur amour non-partagé.

Hikari et Mari sont deux lycéennes qui s'entendent bien et qui sont amies. Hikari est une jeune fille plutôt banale et assez transparente alors que Mari est lumineuse. Elles se rapprochent petit à petit de Otani, un garçon bruyant et populaire et de son ami, Asagari, qui est plus calme et posé.
description.pt-br: Hikari é a típica caloura do ensino médio que recentemente sonhou acordada com a história de amor de Mari, sua tímida melhor amiga. Ela decide shippar Mari com Ootani-kun, seu colega de classe, depois de descobrir sobre sua paixão por Mari quando seu amigo, Asagiri-kun, tentou fazer os dois conversarem. A personagem principal é Mari, o protagonista é Ootani e Hikari é a típica melhor amiga da história. Nada mal... certo? Uma história juvenil entre quatro crianças passando por um amor não correspondido.

altTitles.en: 初心者オバケちゃんの漫画

description.en:
A short story about a girl who's new to being a ghost.  
  
Creator-approved translation by [TheElusiveTaco.](https://twitter.com/elusive_taco)

altTitles.th: รักอลวนคนสลับบ้าน

description.en: Nagi Umino was mistakenly switched at birth, and now attends a prestigious private high school. One day, he has a chance meeting with Erika Amano, an incredibly high society highschool girl who claims she's on the way to meet her fiancé, and who asks/forces him to be her fake boyfriend. Neither of them, at the time, understood the significance of their meeting for Erika was the girl Nagi was switched at birth with, and Nagi was Erika's soon-to-be fiancé!
description.es: Una comedia romántica sobre Nagi yendo a una reunión con sus verdaderos padres, y sobre Erika, que está atormentada por un compromiso no deseado!
description.fr: Nagi est un élève sérieux passionné par ses études. Un jour, alors qu'il est en deuxième année, il découvre qu'il a été échangé à la naissance avec une fille. Espérant garder leurs enfants biologiques et adoptifs, leurs parents décident qu'ils vont se fiancer pour pouvoir rester en famille. Mais Nagi est déjà amoureux d'une autre fille...
description.it: Nagi Umino, studente al secondo anno di una prestigiosa scuola preparatoria, ha scoperto di essere un bambino scambiato alla nascita. Un giorno, mentre si sta dirigendo all'incontro con i suoi veri genitori, incontra Erika Amano, una strana ragazza promessa in sposa nonostante la giovane età. Rifiutando di sposarsi, costringe Nagi a far finta di essere il suo ragazzo per cercare di far desistere i genitori dall'idea del matrimonio. Nagi e Erika scopriranno di avere molto più in comune di quanto pensino!
description.ja: 赤ちゃんの頃に取り違えられ、今は名門私立に通う高校 2年の海野凪。ある日、これから許嫁に会いにいくという超お嬢様女子高生・天野エリカと偶然出会い、彼氏のフリをしてくれと半ば強引に頼まれてしまう。だが、その時の二人は知る由もなかった。エリカは凪と取り違えられた子どもで、凪はエリカの許嫁相手だということを……。
description.ru: Романтическая комедия о Наги, идущем на встречу со своими настоящими родителями, и о Эрике, которая мучается из-за нежеланной помолвки!..
description.pt-br: Uma comédia romântica sobre Nagi que está indo se encontrar com seus verdadeiros pais e sobre Erika, que é atormentada por um casamento indesejado!

description.en: On his first day of transferring to a new high school, a loner named Mori Buntarou, is cajoled by a classmate into climbing the school building. Despite knowing that one misstep could send him spiraling to his death, he moves forward, and upon finally reaching the top, Mori experiences a sense of fulfillment. That feeling, which seems to be telling him, "You're alive!" gives birth to an adrenaline for rock-climbing.
description.ru:
В старшей школе Северной Ёкосуки новый, необычный ученик – Мори Бунтаро. В первый же день он отдает предпочтение крыше здания, чем ее кабинетам, где со всех сторон сыплются расспросы. Чтобы отвязаться от надоедливых одноклассников, лихо спрыгивающих с карниза вниз по веревке, Мори совершает безумный поступок: без страховки забирается на крышу по трубе, да еще в таком месте, где это достаточно проблематично, даже для тренированного человека! Одноклассник Миямото и Ониси-сенсей в ужасе и восторге, ведь они профессиональные скалолазы, а тут появляется такой способный ученик! Но Мори не разделяет их восторга и не принимает помощи. Нелюдимый и гордый, он всего добивается в одиночку, и трудности скалолазания его не пугают. Он собирается покорять вершину за вершиной, с каждый разом поднимаясь все выше.   
  
Note: Sakamoto Shinichi did both the story and the art from Volume 4 onwards.  
  


---

**Officially Translated:**  
- In French by [Delcourt](https://www.editions-delcourt.fr/mangas/series/serie-ascension)
description.uz: Yangi o'rta maktabga ko'chib o'tganining birinchi kuni Mori Buntaru ismli yolg'iz o'quvchini sinfdoshi ko'ndirib maktab binosiga ko'tariladi. Bir xato qadam uni o'limga olib kelishi mumkinligini bilsa ham, u oldinga siljiydi va nihoyat cho'qqiga chiqqandan so'ng, Mori qoniqish hissini boshdan kechiradi. O‘sha tuyg‘u, go‘yo unga: “Sen tiriksan!” qoyaga chiqish uchun adrenalin tug'diradi.

description.en:
'scrolling through social media, dating lightly, ex-lovers like friends' These days, dating is like this? Haha Really? lol) A spring day full of excitement.. I will be satisfied with the webtoon again this time. ^^

---

description.fr:
"Flirter, c'est sur les réseaux sociaux. Sortir ensemble, avec légèreté. Rester amis avec son ex."
En ce moment, c'est ça être en couple ? Vraiment ? Haha
Message du responsable : Un jour de printemps plein de palpitations... Nous allons vous satisfaire en webtoon une fois de plus. ^^
description.ko:
‘썸은 SNS로, 연애는 가볍게, 전애인과는 친구처럼’
요즘 연애는 이렇게 한다고?ㅋㅋ 진짜? ㅋㅋ
담당자의 말) 설렘가득한 봄날.. 이번에도 웹툰으로 대리만족하겠습니다. ^^

altTitles.ja: いちごの入ったソーダ水

description.en: Mannenrou Ladies' Academy is famous for its upper class and posh students. Despite knowing how out-of-place she'd be, the former yankee, Hanaizumi Luna, decides to enroll there. Moreover, according to her underling: "Girls' schools means yuri!! Add in school dormitories? Now that's a world of girl on girl action!!"

altTitles.ru: Брак с Нуля: Как Поджарить Нашу Любовь

altTitles.th: จุดรักเราด้วยเตาถ่าน

description.en: After their fateful encounter through a dating app, Kenta and Chihiro decided to get married with zero days of dating in light of Kenta’s transfer. As a couple who got married without knowing much about each other, they deepen their relationship through their regular weekend BBQs.
description.ja:
マッチングアプリで運命の出会いを果たした、健太と千尋。奥手すぎて最初の一歩を踏み出せずにいるふたりが、健太の浜松への転勤をきっかけに急進展。なんと…交際ゼロ日で結婚することに！　

お互いをよく知らないまま夫婦になったふたりは、毎週末のBBQでじっくり仲を深めていく――。
description.ru: После роковой встречи через приложение для знакомств, Кента и Чихиро решили пожениться с нулевым количеством дней знакомств в свете перевода Кенты. Как пара, которая вышла замуж, не зная многого друг о друге, они развивают свои отношения путём регулярных выходных с барбекю.
description.pt-br: Quando Kenta, de 30 anos, conhece a designer gráfica Chihiro, ele queima seu exterior descolado com sua paixão por churrasco! Agora, após um lampejo de namoro, eles são recém-casados! Embora seus empregos os mantenham separados, eles ainda têm fins de semana juntos para grelhar, e carne boa não é a única coisa que está esquentando neste relacionamento escaldante!
